topics.body:
One thing I always find annoying is that people tend to focus on the remakes of Tatsunoko anime over the first ones. (They were really great for the time. And most of them have aged quite well.)

The main offenders are Tekkaman blade, (The least bad offender) Casshan sins, And Gatchaman crowds. (And I feel that Yatterman Night might be creeping into this status)
